name: @typhonjs-fvtt/validate-manifest
description: Provides validation functions / JSON schemas for FVTT module / system manifests & manifest+ extensions.
author: Michael Leahy <support@typhonjs.io> (https://github.com/typhonrt)

scripts.compile: node src/merge/merge.js && node src/compile/compileSchema.js && ajv compile --all-errors --strict-types=false -r "src/schema/shared/**/*.json" -s "src/schema/validators/**/*.json" -c ajv-errors -o dist-intermediate/validator-functions.js && prettier --write "./dist-intermediate/validator-functions.js" && rollup --config
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run compile && npm run test
